metadata.dc:author: de la Fuente Perucho, A
Payá Pardo, J M
Moreno Koch, M C
Pérez Cuadrado, S
metadata.dc:description: Blastic transformation in vitro was used to estimate immunological competence in patients having gastrointestinal cancer. The authors found a correlation between lymphocyte transformation by phytohemagglutinin and prognosis. Autologous plasma inhibited lymphocyte transformation, particularly in those patients that proved to have an unfavorable clinical evolution one year after surgery.
metadata.dc:title: Control inmunológico en pacientes con carcinomas del tracto gastrointestinal.
[Immunologic control in patients with cancer of the gastrointestinal tract].
